subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer is chasing her third win this season on the L.P.G.A. tour with a six-stroke lead, and Phil Mickelson had a hole in one at the Scottish Open.
snippet: Paula Creamer is chasing her third win this season on the L.P.G.A. tour with a six-stroke lead, and Phil Mickelson had a hole in one at the Scottish Open.
